source: TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_SEQ_00<tab>The reserved U'tykha Tia would have you light a fire within his struggling novice, U'kahzuna.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_SEQ_00<tab>ウ・チャカ・ティアは、冒険者にもうひとつ依頼があるようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_SEQ_01<tab>U'tykha Tia informs you that he has the novice ranger U'kahzuna out practicing her skills on roving Amalj'aa in the east of the Sagolii Desert. As previously, he seems aware that she yet needs a push in order for her to reach her potential. Sensing that a teachable moment is nigh, he bids you seek U'kahzuna in the Sagolii Desert, and then defeat three Amalj'aa with her as witness.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_SEQ_01<tab>駆け出し狩人のウ・カズナが、アマルジャ族を倒しに行ったまま、帰ってこないらしい。サゴリー砂漠の東に行って「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2086B01 /var>」「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2010401 /var>」「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F0FC01 /var>」を計3体倒そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_SEQ_02<tab>Three lizardmen have been dispatched by your hands, and U'kahzuna is perfectly caught between mortification and fury. Now, /psych her up as U'tykha Tia has requested.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_SEQ_02<tab>アマルジャ族を倒した。「ウ・カズナ」にエモート「活を入れる」をしよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_SEQ_03<tab>You have psyched up U'kahzuna with great subtlety and finesse. Go and make your report to U'tykha Tia.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_SEQ_03<tab>ウ・カズナに活を入れた。忘れられたオアシスの「ウ・チャカ・ティア」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_SEQ_04<tab>Before you can celebrate your successful demonstration, U'tykha Tia mentions with some irritation that U'khuba Tia saw fit to upbraid U'kahzuna on her return. He is worried that, without further intervention, the young ranger may cease her attempts to better herself.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_SEQ_04<tab>ウ・チャカ・ティアによると、戻ってきたウ・カズナを、ウ・クバ・ティアが叱っていたらしい。ウ・チャカ・ティアは苛立っているようだが……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_TODO_00<tab>Defeat Amalj'aa in the eastern Sagolii Desert.

target: TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_TODO_01<tab>ウ・カズナに「活を入れる」をする
TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_TODO_02<tab>ウ・チャカ・ティアに報告

source: TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_UTYKHATIA_000_000<tab>Ah, a familiar scent. I like the way you handled yourself the last time. Would you be my helping hand in the desert once more?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_UTYKHATIA_000_000あー、さっきの冒険者ちゃんー。
乗りかかったチョコボだと思ってさぁ、
ちょっとさー、もうひとつ頼むよー。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_UTYKHATIA_000_001<tab>You remember U'kahzuna, don't you? I have her where she needs to be─out hunting Amalj'aa in the eastern Sagolii Desert, humbled, petulant, and with no idea how to gather her wits or her skills.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_UTYKHATIA_000_001駆け出し狩人のカズナちゃんが、サゴリー砂漠の東に、
アマルジャ族を倒しにいってさぁ。
でも、また帰ってこないんだよねー、アハハ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_UTYKHATIA_000_002<tab>The kindling is laid; all it needs is a spark. Go east and dispatch three Amalj'aa before U'kahzuna's eyes─harden that heart of hers, so weighed down already with shame and pique. Then, with a deft <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>psych<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, strike upon that flint.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_UTYKHATIA_000_002だからさぁ、お手本にアマルジャ族を
3体倒してやってくれないかなー。
ついでに、カズナちゃんに「活を入れて」やってよー。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_UKAHZUNA_000_020<tab>I-I'm sorry! I hate having to repeat that over and over, I just... I have no idea what I'm doing. I got this far into their encampment, and then I froze! <var 1A 02 /var>Argh<var 1A 01 /var>! It's all so pointless!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_UKAHZUNA_000_020うわぁーん、ごめんなさいごめんなさい！
私がアマルジャ族を倒そうだなんて、
考えが甘すぎましたーーっ！！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_UKAHZUNA_000_021<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Ah<var 1A 01 /var>! Adventurer, I bore witness to your deeds! You...you were amazing. I felt as though I was in a daze, but now I'm fully aroused! I... I shall need time to consider your actions this day. Farewell.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_UKAHZUNA_000_021ア、アマルジャ族を倒すなんて、すごい！
私もがんばらなきゃ！　活入りましたー！
大丈夫です、ひとりで帰れますーーーーーっ！！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_UTYKHATIA_000_030<tab>Well done and thank you, adventurer. But I'm afraid someone may have wrecked our effort. That double-dyed fool U'khuba saw fit to give her another of his lectures as soon as she rode back in.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_UTYKHATIA_000_030……冒険者ちゃん、ありがと。
でもね、さっきクソ馬鹿のクバがさぁ、
戻ってきたカズナちゃんを叱っちゃったんだよー。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_UTYKHATIA_000_031<tab>Grrrah! The man is such a fool! His scolding ways have cost us more novices than the desert and the beastmen combined. U'khuba has little love for anyone but himself.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB110_00829_UTYKHATIA_000_031まったく、クソ馬鹿のクバめー。
新米を叱って、いじめるのはやめろって言ってるのに！
